mapper.select: select * from times_user where username = #{username,jdbcType=INTEGER} and password = #{password,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into times_user (id, userid, username, password, userps) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userps,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
